Method Detail

getList

public java.util.ArrayList getList()
                            throws FlickrException,
                                   java.io.IOException,
                                   org.xml.sax.SAXException
Return a list of Flickr pandas, from whom you can request photos using the getPhotos(Panda, Set, int, int) API method. This method does not require authentication.

Returns:
A list of pandas
Throws:
FlickrException
java.io.IOException
org.xml.sax.SAXException

getPhotos

public PhotoList getPhotos(Panda panda,
                           java.util.Set extras,
                           int perPage,
                           int page)
                    throws FlickrException,
                           java.io.IOException,
                           org.xml.sax.SAXException
Ask the Flickr Pandas for a list of recent public (and "safe") photos. This method does not require authentication.

Parameters:
panda - The panda to ask for photos from.
extras - A set of Strings controlling the extra information to fetch for each returned record. Extras.ALL_EXTRAS
perPage - The number of photos to show per page
page - The page offset
Returns:
A PhotoList
Throws:
FlickrException
java.io.IOException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
See Also:
Extras
